modName: Light up the night - People Have Torches - Compatibility Patches
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE: REMEMBER TO DOWNLOAD THE WIC PATCH FOR CoS, IF YOU\'RE USING BOTH. You\'ll crash otherwise.

Current patches for \"People Have Torches\" and \"People Have Lanterns\" so far: Immersive Armors, Winter is Coming and Cloaks of Skyrim.

Bandits will finally have torches in their dark caves. Even the Forsworn is tired of bumping into walls.

Compability patches for \"People Have Torches\", the wonderful mod by \"Searyan\" which can be found @ http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14019.

NMM installation:
1. Download the main \"People Have Torches\" file @ http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14019 
2. Download the patch you need.
3. Install main \"People Have Torches\"
4. Install Patch and when asked to upgrade select \"no\"
5. Load it after whatever is lowest in the load order. It\'s usually Immersive Armor, Cloaks of Skyrim or Winter is Coming depending on which you use.
6. Make sure it\'s checked and you\'re good to go!

Manual Installation:
1. Download the main \"People Have Torches\" file @ http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14019 
2. Download the patch you need.
3. Unzip it
4. Drop into your Skryim/data folder
5. Use your favorite mod management tool and load it after whatever is lowest in the load order. It\'s usually Immersive Armor, Cloaks of Skyrim or Winter is Coming depending on which you use.
6. Make sure it\'s checked and you\'re good to go.

Requests for the future!
If you are running any mod alongside \"People Have Torches\" and various NPCs are missing torches, let me know and I will see if I can make a compatibility patch for that mod.

Changelog:
V1.1.1
BAIN Installer added.

V1.1
Added NMM installer. 
BAIN Installer is in the works and should be up soon.

V1.0.3
Added several new patches which were \"missing\" including WIC & IA patch and all of the PHL counterparts!

V1.0.2
3 new patches aimed at \"Winter is Coming\" uploaded
- Patch for PHT & \"Winter is Coming\"
- Patch for PHT, \"Winter is Coming\" & \"Cloaks of Skyrim\"
- Patch for PHT, \"Winter is Coming\", \"Cloaks of Skyrim\" & \"Immersive Armor\" 

V1.0.1
3 new patches upload for \"People Have Lanterns\". Can be found under Optional Files.

V1.0
- Adds Torches to Bandits, Forsworn, Necromancers & more.

3 Patches uploaded
- Patch for PHT & \"Cloaks of Skyrim\"
- Patch for PHT & \"Immersive Armor\"
- Patch for PHT, \"Immersive Armor\" & \"Cloaks of Skyrim\"

Credits:
Huge credit to Searyan aka Sean_s for making this awesome mod and letting me upload these patches.
Also a huge credit to ElminsterAU for \"TES5Edit\"!
